title: [$$] Tech Stalwarts Drive Market Surge
text:
Tech Stalwarts Drive Market Surge Results at Amazon, Google and Microsoft show each solidifying position in Internet economy By Dan.Strumpf@wsj.com Oct. 23, 2015 7:34 p.m. ET 
U.S. technology shares scaled fresh heights on Friday, fueled by upbeat earnings that renewed investorsâ€™ faith that the giants are solidifying their dominant positions at the center of the Internet economy despite a raft of upstarts. 
Investors added about $90 billion to the combined market value of Amazon.com Inc., Google parent Alphabet Inc. and Microsoft Corp. Half of the 10 most-valuable U.S. public companies now are tech...
